74205.summary: Some customers in the Willingdon Heights area of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
74205.title: Mar 14 - Burnaby (Willingdon Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

74226.title: Mar 15 - Calgary (Downtown) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
